text: Keepers can be kept for two years. 2020 season doesn't count towards years kept.
Drafted players that are kept will be the N-1 round draft pick, where N is their draft position from the previous year.
First round picks cannot be kept.
Drafted players that are traded are reduced 2 additional draft spots.
Teams can trade drafted players twice per season.
Waiver pickups are the equivalent of 20th round picks.
